name: Gameball
author: Gameball

sections.description:
Gameball is a one-stop platform to market your products and keep your customers engaged, leading to boosted conversion and increased RoI. With a wide range of customizable features and powerful insights, we help you build a data-driven plan.
Join thousands of brands around the world who trust Gameball to unlock growth.
Every day we grow, by helping businesses grow. This plugin allows you to connect your WooCommerce store with your Gameball account.

Core features of Gameball:

  • Create gamified loyalty programs by rewarding their customers with badges, leveling up, loyalty points.. etc
  • Create gamified loyalty programs to reward customers with badges, leveling up, points, and discounts
  • Ability to redeem points as discounts while placing orders
  • Send interactive, event-triggered, and targeted messages as well as push notifications to both guest visitors and registered customers
  • Build referral and affiliate management programs, where you easily reward your customers for referrals. The more your customers refer your products and services to their network, the more points they get
sections.installation:
Installation should follow the below steps:

  1. Install Gameball plugin
  2. Activate the plugin from the “Plugins” page in your WordPress admin dashboard.
  3. A new menu item will be added to your WordPress admin dashboard called “Gameball”, use it to configure your Gameball settings.
  4. Add your Gameball “API Key” and “Transaction Key”. You will find them in your Gameball dashboard. For more information, check this article: https://help.gameball.co/en/articles/3467114-how-can-you-get-your-account-integration-details-api-key-transaction-key
  5. Select the events that you wish to use to build your gamified rewards experience.
  6. Save your settings.
  7. Login to your Gameball dashboard and enjoy your experience!
sections.faq:
How can I create a Gameball account?

Drop us an email at sales@gameball.co and one of our agents will guide you through. Starting July 2020,
you will be able to create your own Gameball account by simply going to www.gameball.co and registering.

What actions or events can I use to reward my customers in my WooCommerce store?

  • View product page
  • Add to cart
  • View cart
  • Place an order
  • Write a product review
  • Remove from cart

You can build your rewards program based on these events and more.

How can I configure the points value used while applying checkout discounts?

You can easily do that from your Gameball dashboard. For detailed information, visit https://help.gameball.co.

How does Gameball referrals work?

Gameball creates unique URLs for every one of your customers. Each URL can be used to attribute referral registrations to their respective customers, and hence reward them with referral points.

Is Gameball for free?

We offer all of our customers a 14-day trial period, however, we currently do not offer free plans. The subscription you pay for Gameball will always be smaller than the money you save in your marketing budget. Gameball helps you significantly reduce your marketing budget by boosting repeated sales, increasing basket size, and motivating word of mouth.
If you are an early-stage company or an NGO, we will be glad to help you with special plans, drop us an email at support@gameball.co.
